metadata.name: Buddy's AIM
metadata.description: Your Buddy's AIM NFT will be revealed soon! Buddy's AIM NFTS are re-creations of classic Buddy Icons from AOL Instant Messenger. Each Buddy's AIM NFT is a nostalgic piece of Web 1.0 internet history for you to own. If Buddy achieves his AIM then he will recreate a working Web 3 version of AIM, with exclusive access for his NFT holders!
